text:
I usually have more conceptual questions on Codementor and Marcus came in with a good idea of what it was that I was very confused about and was quick to direct me to the concepts that I was missing.

We discussed ActiveRecord (pattern, not gem).
What to pass in a RESTful API to reduce cognitive load
When to use objects and when to use serialized IDs as function parameters.
